{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Coral Dev Board Mini.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Single Board Computer with Edge TPU |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://coral.ai/products/dev-board-mini |sp = https://coral.ai/docs/dev-board-mini/get-started |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Coral_Dev_Board_Mini |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Google |model = Coral |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Dev Board Mini |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board, single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = HFS-NX2KA1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT8167A; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A35 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC08G-MB29; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT6CL512T32AM-H1; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = F4:F5:E8,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2019.10;; |stockos = Linux;4.19.125-mtk;Mendel Linux;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (Type C), Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C)
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, via GPIO header,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5, AI Accelerator, Micro HDMI 1.4a, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, Audio 3.5mm out, microphone, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO, |addchip = Google Edge TPU ML Accelerator Module;Coral;G313-06329-00;;1;,,, Plug & Trust Secure Element;NXP;A71CH;;1;,,, PMIC;MediaTek;MT6392A;;1;,,, Digital High-SNR SiSonic Microphone;Knowles Electronics;SPK0415;;1;,,, USB PD And Type C Current-Limited Power Switch;NXP;NX5P3090;;1;,,, 2A High-Efficiency Step-Down Converter;TI;TVL62084;;1;,,, 1A Ideal Diode with Ultra-Low Voltage Drop;Maxim;MAX40200;;4;,,, DC/DC Converter IC;Texas Instruments;TPS62130;;1;,,, 4-Bit 20 Mb/s Dual-Supply Level Translator;ON Semi;NLSX4378;;2;,,, Dual Channel EMI Filter w/Integrated ESD Protection;Nexperia;PCMF2HDMI2S;;2;,,, 1.0 to 6.0 GHz SPDT Switch;Skyworks;SKY13585;;1;,,, Dual-band / Dual-mode Multilayer Chip Diplexer;ACX;DP1608;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = mendel |defaultpass = mendel |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/18/2020 |estreldate = 10/2020 |estprice = 100 |upc = 193575011295 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA9DEDP20260 |asin = B08QLXKJB7 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7658CSN;MediaTek, ARM, MT7658CSN, 2028-BZAAL |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[MediaTek]]'' MT8167A (Quad core) [[ARM]] (Cortex-A35) @1.5GHz *GPU: ''PowerVR'' GE8300 :1080p60 HEVC, MPEG4 Decoder :720p/30 MPEG2, H.263, H264 Decoder *TPU: ''Google Edge'' ML Accelerator Co-processor *Storage: 8GB eMMC flash + Micro SD (TF) slot *RAM: 2GB (LPDDR3) @ 1600MHz *WLAN: 802.11abgn/ac (1T1R) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Type-C (OTG) *Power Source: USB Type-C
===Requirement=== *USB Type-C cable with data transfer function *Monitor with Micro HDMI cable, Keyboard and Mouse set *5V USB Type-C Power Supply
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/17/buy-coral-dev-board-mini-sbc/ ''Google Coral Dev Board mini SBC is now available for $100'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/googles-dev-board-mini-sbc-launches-for-100/ ''Googleâ€™s Dev Board Mini SBC launches for $100'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
